Description:
Prime Investment with a 5 Star Lease Agreement On A Corner Allotment with Two Street Frontages !!
This exciting investment opportunity is situated in one of Geelong's top performing suburbs renowned for generous capital growth and is perfectly located within walking distance to Corio Shopping Village, quality schools, local transport and just moments away from Geelong's ring road. Underpinning this rare find is a reliable rent return of $250 per week, allowing the new owners to simply set and forget any issues associated with acquiring quality tenants in times of uncertainty.
• North Facing Family Room with Floor Heater & Wall Mounted Aircon
• 2 Generous Bedrooms with Freestanding Cupboards
• Spacious Kitchen with Zoned Meals Area & Gas Cooking
• 466m² (approximately) Corner Allotment with two Street Frontages
• Fully Fenced and Secure with Additional Bungalow
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Perfect Position
When location and low-maintenance living is a must you can't look past this fantastic 1 bedroom unit! Located within walking distance to Corio Shopping Centre and with the Geelong Ring Road also right at your fingertips making commuting a breeze.
Featuring an open plan kitchen, meals and living area with gas heating and split system air-conditioning. One great sized bedroom is generous in size with built in robes. The laundry and bathroom are combined with a separate WC. Outdoors is a more than generous open space perfect for a young family, with a single lockup garage.
- Close to all amenities
- Currently tenanted $225 per week
- Great for young couple or investor
*Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
"Immaculate Family Living On Huge Block"
Situated in a sought after area surrounded by quality homes, this home is one not to be missed! On an extra large 704m2 block (approx) boasting 3 good sized bedrooms plus study/4th bedroom, 2 large living areas, open plan kitchen/dining/main living zone, ensuite and walk in robe to main bedroom plus built in robes to remaining bedrooms. Ducted heating and A/C, floating floorboards throughout. Double lock up remote garage plus side access for boat/caravan/trailer parking. Enormous backyard with plenty of room for the children to play whilst located right next door to a play park. All within quick and easy access to the Geelong Ring Rd for Melbourne/Geelong commuting, public transport readily available & only a couple of minutes' from all major facilities.
-3 Bedrooms + Study/4th Bedroom
-2 Bathrooms
-2 Extra Large Living Zones
-Built in Robes
-Side/Rear Access for Caravans/Boats/Trailers
-Double Lock Up Remote Garage
-704m2 Block Approx
-Potential for Future Subdivision (STCA)
-Easy Access to Geelong Ring Rd for Commuting
*Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
"Family Living At Its Best!"
Located in the popular Shell Estate is this neat & tidy family home on a generous allotment providing a great opportunity to enter the market for the first time or perfect addition to your investment portfolio. Consisting of 3 good-sized bedrooms all with BIRs, 2 bathrooms, 2 large open plan living areas plus a large undercover outdoor entertaining area. Separate bungalow at the rear with split/sys heating/cooling plus a big 4 lock up garage & 2 carports with rear/side access. Set within walking distance to schools, shops, shopping centres, medical facilities & easy access to the Geelong Ring Road & freeway.
-3 Good-Sized Bedrooms
-2 Bathrooms
-Ample Heating & Cooling
-On 613m2 (approx)
-Currently tenanted at $420 per week ($21,840 per annum)
-Easy To Commute Via Geelong Ring Rd & Princes Hwy
-Walking Distance to Schools, Shops & Public Transport
*Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
844m2 approx. allotment in the heart of Corio.
Don't miss your opportunity to secure this neat, brick veneer family home situated on an incredible 844m2 approx. parcel of land just minutes from the Corio Shopping Centre. Nestled in a quiet court location surrounded by established homes you'd be hard pressed to find such a lavish allotment in such a brilliant location. Perfect for all buyers alike the property offers an array of different possibilities for its new owners, whether you're looking for an ideal family home with a large back yard, an investment property close to all amenities or looking to potentially sub-divide and develop (STCA). The home itself comprises of a large lounge room
at the entrance with floorboards that flow throughout the home. The practical kitchen offers ample bench space adjacent the meals area that opens to the study nook. All three generous bedrooms sit at the rear of the home with easy access to the central bathroom and laundry. Outside you're sure to be impressed with the vast space that is on offer. The large drive way leads to an undercover carport and continues towards the extended double garage complete with additional workshop. Plenty of room remains for pets and the whole family to enjoy. Located with all major amenities right on your doorstep, with schools for all ages located just a short stroll away & public transport easily accessible what more could you want?
Insights: 4 Durham Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat, sweet and complete.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Ray Rounds on 0417 335 576.
Located in the popular suburb of Corio, within close proximity to local schools, public transport, Corio Shopping Centre and Princes Highway for commuters, this property is in immaculate condition and is a must-see inspection.
On offer are three spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes, separate lounge room, spacious living room which flows through to the kitchen & meals area with ample storage and easily accessed to the fabulous undercover outdoor area, the perfect spot for outdoor entertaining.
Other features include:
Gas heating
Reverse cycle air conditioner
Undercover outdoor alfresco entertaining area
6 person spa bath, (in full working order)
Garage with extra storage
Room for 2 other cars down driveway
Private and secure
Land size 650m2 approx
Don't you be the one to miss out on this terrific property being sold for the first time in over 30 years.
Photo ID at all inspections please.

Description:
Attention Tradies, Investors and First Home Buyers!
This neatly renovated 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom, 2 living zone home has everything you will need and more. Sitting on 646m2 it's located in a quiet pocket of north western Corio and would be an ideal first home, home for the tradie or investment property with expected rental return of $370/week. With a north/south orientation on the block it provides the rear of the home and alfresco with winter warmth and all year round natural lighting. A substantial carport offers plenty of off street parking with room for 4 vehicles in addition to the SLUG with workshop space. The home itself has 3 good sized bedrooms all with built in robes. A 2 way central bathroom services both the master bedroom and the rest of the house with bath and separate shower recess. The kitchen is positioned in the middle of the home between the 2 living spaces - an L shaped lounge /dining at the front of the home and the 2nd living at the rear with an open plan lounge and kitchen. This area also connects to the carport and alfresco through 2 sets of sliding glass door. Heating and cooling are via 2 split system airconditioners which allow for all year round comfort. New carpet throughout really finish off a lovely interior. Outside the home is surrounded by lovely garden beds and lawn and at the rear there are planter boxes for the keen gardener who likes to grow their own vegies. This property has been meticulously prepared both inside and out. With a larger block like this one there is still scope for further development. Either way this is a fantastic opportunity to buy a home ready to live in or rent. Be quick to inspect because this one won't last!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
"Offering an abundance of space both inside and outside
Suiting first home buyers, investors and downsizers alike, this property provides all the necessities for breezy, low maintenance living in a central and convenient location.
When entering the property you are greeted with a large formal living area with an updated gas wall heater, semi updated kitchen with electric cooktop, split system heating & cooling, as well as two good sized bedrooms both offering built in robes & ceiling fans. The extra large bathroom sits to the rear of the property. Outside of the property there is plenty of space, an undercover alfresco at the rear, and the front yard has plenty of space for the kids to play.
Located perfectly with the Corio Shopping Centre and public transport at your fingertips, and with easy access to the Geelong Ring Road for commuting to Melbourne and the Surf Coast, this home would suit all buyers in the market and is not to be missed!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Well presented home, ticking all the right boxes.
This beautifully presented, well maintained three bedroom family home, set on a low maintenance allotment of approx. 632m2, is sure to impress. You will be impressed by the warmth, charm and wonderful natural light beaming throughout. A stunning entrance flows from the hallway into a spacious formal lounge/living room offering split system cooling, electric heating and ceiling fan, catering for all seasons. Comprising of three comfortable sized bedrooms (two with BIRs) and an additional bungalow, at the side of the home, which can be used as a fourth bedroom. Servicing the home is an updated central bathroom with shower and double vanity for added convenience. The hallway continues into the kitchen and dining with pantry and ample storage space which then adjoins into the separate laundry.
The backyard is a blank canvas ready for the garden enthusiast and with enough room for kids to run around and play and the added bonus of an undercover alfresco for those warmer days with family or friends. Located within only moments to local schools, sporting facilities, the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and the Princes Highway for commuters. Don't wait, call today to book your private inspection.

Description:
Style, Location & Affordability In Perfect Harmony
** Private inspections allowed for regional stage 3, contact now to book your time **
A relaxed and easy going atmosphere is evident from the moment you step inside this much loved home and the central position ensures that everything is literally at your fingertips. Add to the mix an iconic family-friendly location that's within minutes to Corio Village, parks, public transport and the primary school, you'll be hard-pressed to find a better and more affordable opportunity! Tasteful styling creates an inviting environment offering 3 comfortable bedrooms, light filled living area, equipped kitchen overlooking dining, central bathroom and separate laundry. Alarm system, heating and cooling also provides year round comfort security while ample off-street parking is in abundance with the long driveway down to the secure single lock up garage. Alfresco entertaining is perfect for all occasions accompanied by low maintenance gardens on a spacious 560m2 approx sun soaked allotment. With fine living considerations in mind & nothing to do but move in and enjoy, this is the ideal home for professional couples, first home buyers and astute investors looking for a rewarding investment in growth corridor. Inspection will impress!

Description:
Immaculate family living.
Impeccably presented with a welcoming facade this beautifully maintained property, in a sought after location of Corio, is sure to impress a range of buyers. A bright formal living room and dining domain are accompanied by three bedrooms (two with BIRs), central bathroom and separate laundry. The spacious kitchen area meets the most demanding of needs and comes complete with a dishwasher and a great view of the rear yard. Further highlights include ducted heating, timber floors, outdoor entertainment area & split system air-conditioning. A well-proportioned rear yard emphasizes the scope of the block and enhances an opportunity defined by such a convenient and highly sought after location. Within close proximity to all major amenities such as local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and Princes Highway, it's family living at its very best!

Description:
STEP INSIDE AND FEEL AT HOME!
Situated on a generous 635m2 sized parcel of land in a peaceful court location, walking distance to the shopping centre, is this beautifully presented 3 bedroom home. The master bedroom has twin robes and there are built in robes in bedroom 2. Bedroom 3 has plenty of room for the double bed and dresser. The kitchen is modern and well equipped with plenty of cupboards, bench space and a dishwasher. The euro laundry is practical with easy access to the door leading to the large rear yard. The separate lounge has plenty of space for the family. The freshly painted walls, warm timber tones of the flooring, window coverings, gas heating and air con. There is plenty of room for the cars as the home comes with a double car port and an oversized 1 1/2 powered garage. Call Sarah Carey today on 0403064510 to arrange your inspection.

Description:
A home the whole family will love.
Introducing this spacious family home which has been designed to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle which is perfect for those looking to extend their investment portfolio or those looking to extend their family.
Comprising of five comfortable bedrooms (two with BIRs and master with ensuite). Stepping inside you are immediately greeted by the light filled main living domain which flows effortlessly through to the kitchen/meals area. In the heart of the home lies the generous family sized bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, while a second bathroom sits just down the hall and provides two way access through to the master bedroom and second lounge room (which could be used as a kids retreat or rumpus). The second living area lies at the back of the home and provides rear access to the large grassed backyard complete with garden shed.
Positioned perfectly, just a short distance to Corio Shopping Centre, local schools and public transport. Commuting is a breeze with easy access to Melbourne or just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's CBD.
Set on approx. 557m2 of land this fantastic family home is sure to be the one for you. Call to inspect today.
Insights: 347 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
The Turnkey Package Youve Been Waiting For
Situated in a quiet and central location within close proximity to local amenities you'll discover this impeccably presented home on a 542m2 allotment (approx) that is guaranteed to impress.
With a full internal renovation and tasteful updates throughout, this great buy is the definition of a move-in ready home.
Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes, a light-filled front lounge and a stylish open plan kitchen and dining with access to the very neat and spacious rear yard.
The exterior of the property comes equipped with a double carport and secure gated side access to the low maintenance rear yard.
With all the updates and hard work all completed, this fantastic turnkey ready home is waiting for you!
Key Features
- 3 bedrooms
- Full internal renovation and tasteful updates throughout
- Set on a 542m2 block (approx)
- Stylish main bathroom
- Gated side access
- Low maintenance yards
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
